name: Blocky Blast
description:
Launch your charming character out of different types of cannons to reach the goal as fast as possible while avoiding moving and often treacherous obstacles.

Play this fun and entertaining game and be the top player!

• Play with a wide variety of different characters
• Over 40 fun levels and many more to come
• Try to avoid the many challenging obstacles in your way
• Grab as many coins as you can
• Very easy one-touch controls
• Try to achieve the fastest time
• All of your progress is saved in the cloud
• Upcoming updates with incredible new stages, characters and multiplayer coming soon!
_________________

Game available in: English, Spanish, French, Japanese, Chinese, German, Portuguese, Italian, Malay, and Korean. More coming soon!
_________________

Blocky Blast is free to play. Some items in the game are available for purchase.

Stay updated on new features!
